typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Rating = iif(year==1988,1,toInteger(Rating)),
		year = iif(year==1960,2021,toInteger(year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(year==1988),
	insertIf(year==2021),
	deleteIf(year==1950)) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(year == 1988 || year == 1960 || year == 1950) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'moviesdelta',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie','year'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Date as date,
		Open as double,
		High as double,
		Low as double,
		Close as double,
		Volume as double,
		Dividend as double,
		Split as double,
		Adj_Open as double,
		Adj_High as double,
		Adj_Low as double,
		Adj_Close as double,
		Adj_Volume as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StocksSource
Filter1 window(over(stocksymbol),
	asc(Date, true),
	startRange: -(days(1)),
	endRange: 0L,
	FifteenDayMovingAvg = lag(High,1,1)) ~> Window1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		High,
		Close,
		FifteenDayMovingAvg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StocksSource derive(stocksymbol = 'msft') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(High > 0) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		round_distance as double,
		avgAmount2 as double,
		avgTip2 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'deltataxi') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(round_distance<10.0)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'deltataxi',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['round_distance','avgAmount2','avgTip2'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	parameter1 as string[] (['a','b','c'])
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(position == 1),
			$parameter1[1] = $$),
		each(match(position == 2),
			$parameter1[2] = $$),
		each(match(position == 3),
			$parameter1[3] = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
